attributes.action: Take more diplomatic action to spare mentally ill Briton Akmal Shaikh from the death sentence in China
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Shaikh faces execution by firing squad for smuggling heroin into China. All evidence suggests he was at best unaware of his actions, at worst manipulated by others recognising his vulnerability and mental illness.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
